content: (paathinompinte budhanaazhcha raavile perunnaall murayanusarichu vishuddha kurbaana anushdhikkukayum kurbaana maddhye “basmalkko” cholliyashesham thale divasam sandhyaapraarththhanaasamayatthu mnortthoyinmel naattiya kurishedutthukondu kuda kodi, evangeliyon aadiyaayavayumaayi aaghoshamaayi palllliyude vadakkevaathil vazhi purappettu pallllikku chuttum pradakshinam nadatthi thekkevaathil vazhi akatthu praveshikkukayum cheyyunnu. Thudarnnu beemaayilo madbahaayilo ninnukondu pattakkaaran sleebaaaaghosham nadatthiyashesham kurishu palllliyude maddhye mnorttho yinmel thanne vachittu kurbaana poortthiyaakkunnu.)

Sleebaaye vandippaanaayu heleni raajnyi
Nyapapattanamaam romayil ninnerushalemaarnnu
/tyoodanmaare-kkoottichonnevam
/tkaanichiduvin-sleebaavachoridam
Nyangallkkundoru pramukhan neeyavanodaaraanyaal
Mishihaa than sleebaayamarum sthhaanam kaanikkum
/thaaleluyyaa-ennavarura cheythu.

Ammaanuyel deveshan tharuvil thoongi
Ilshaadaayu thanayan veeran thalathaazhtthi marichu.
/taathmam maathram-tharuvil kaivittu
/tnijasaaraamsham-meniyil nivasichu.
Verpettaan nissaaramathaam maanushamaam jeevan
Vilapicheedattunnathane krooshichor yoodar
/thaaleluyyaa -kashdamavarkkennum.

items.content: Nyangallude daivamaaya mishihaa, deerghadarshimaarude thalavanaaya moshayude vadiyude rahasyam ninne soochippichu. Israayelyarude paallayatthinte naduvil athu naattappettappoll rakshaakaramaaya ninte sleebaayeyum athu soochippichu. Ippoll vishuddha sabha ithaa vishuddha nompinte maddhyatthil athinte prajakallude samrakshanatthinum samvathsaratthinte anugrahatthinum phalangall anugrahikkappettu ellaa upadravangallilninnum aapatthukallilninnum samrakshikkappedunnathinum shikshakallilninnum kopatthinte vadikallilninnumulllla samrakshaykkum vendi jeevadaayakamaaya ninte sleebaaye aaghoshikkunnu. Nyangall ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum vishuddha roohaayeyum sthothramcheythu mahathvappedutthumaaraakaname.

content: Nyangallude shathrukkalle ninnaal nyangall kutthi murikkayum nyangallude ethiraallikalle ninte naamammoolam nyangall chavittukayum cheyyum.

Saukhyam pitthallasarppatthe
Veekshichorkkullavaayathu pol
Sleebaaye nathi cheyyunnor
Rogaapashamanam nedunnu
Karunaasaagaramaam naathhaa!
Praarththhichadiyaarothunnu. Kuriye... Kuriye....Kuriye....

items.content: Nyangallude daivamaaya mishihaa! Nyangall nigallatthilninnum prashamsayilninnum vedippaakkappettu ninte vishuddhanmaaraaya deerghadarshimaar mukhaantaram soochippikkappettittulllla ninte vishuddha rahasyangallude smaranaye anushdhippaan nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Jeevadaayakamaaya ninte sleebaayude rakshaakaramaaya adayaallam nyangallude hyadayangallil sthhaapikkaname. Athine darshikkunnathinaal nyangallude manassu vedippaakkappedukayum athine vandikkunnathinaal nyangallude vichaarangall vishuddhamaakkappedukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Sarvva dushdaganangallum nyangallilninnu odippokumaaraakaname. Ninte sleebaayude adayaallatthaal vanchanayude aathmaakkallkkethiraayi nyangalle bheekaranmaaraakkittheerkkaname. Kartthaave! Nyangall ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum vishuddharuhaayeyum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum vandichu pukazhtthumaaraakaname. Hosho.....

content: Avanil sookshichu avanil sharanappeduvin ningall lajikkendi varikayilla.

Nompinmaddhye jeevadamaam
Sleebaayin vijayapathaaka
Nalkiya rakshaakarane! Ni-
Nnavathaaram visamayaneeyam
Karunaasaagaramaam naathhaa!
Praarththhichadiyaarothunnu. Kuriye... Kuriye.. Kuriyo,

items.content: Poorvvika deerghadarshimaaraal soochippikkappettavanum paallayamaddhyatthil naattiya pitthallasarppam moolam mosha drshdaantappedutthiyavanumaaya daivame! Nee sleebaamel uyartthappettappoll ninne aaraadhikkuvaanaayi srshdikalle nee aakarshichu. Pheraoneyum aamaalekkineyum nee nashippichu. Kartthaave! Ninte sleebaayude paarshvangallil nyangalle marachukollllaname. Kartthaave! Abaar raajaavinte apekshakettu vedanakallilninnum rogangallilninnum avanu svasthhathanalkiyathupole balaheenarum paapikallumaaya ninte daasaraakunna nyangallude nompum praarththhanayum kaikkondu ninte sleebaayaal nyangallude murivukalle sukhappedutthaname. Nyangallude kartthaavum nyangallude nithyadaivavume! Ninte karunayaal nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum pariharikkaname.

content: Ethiraallikallilninnu nyangalle rakshikkukayum nyangallude shathrukkalle lajippikkukayum cheythavan neeyaakunnu.

Dushdaathmaavodadaraadaan
Shakthi nararkkillaatthathinaal
Nompum jeevasleebaayum
Naathhan nammallkkaayu nalki
Karunaasaagaramaam naathhaa!
Praarththhichadiyaarothunnu. Kuriye.... Kuriye....Kuriye ....

items.content: Pitthallasarppatthaal soochippikkappedukayum upamikkappedukayum cheytha mishihaathampuraane! Ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu. Paapatthinte maranakaramaaya visham nyangallilninnu neekkikkallany, saatthaante damshanangallilninnu nyangallude aathmashareerangalle sukhappedutthaname. Aa pitthallasarppam athil drshdiyurappikkunnavare sukhappedutthiyirunnathupole kartthaave! Nyangallude drshdi ninnilum ninte sleebaayilum pathinyirikkunnathinaal nyangallude vedanakalleyum rogangalleyum sukhappedutthaname. Nyangallude kannukall ningkal pathinyirikkunnu. Nyangallude sharanavum prathyaashayum sadaa ninnil prathishdhichirikkunnu. Nyangallude jeevante rakshithaavum uddhaarakanumaaya ninne nyangall ariyukayum cheyyunnu; ninakkum ninte pithaavinum vishuddha roohaaykkum ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthuthiyum sthothravum nyangall karettunnu.

content: Ninte rakshayin paricha enikku nee nalki. Ninte valathukai enne sahaayikkukayum ninte shikshanatthil enne vallartthukayum cheyyaname.

Dushdaathmaavin senayeve-
Nnaathmeeyam jeevan nedaan
Nompin naduvil jeevadamaam
Sleebaaye rakshakaneki
Karunaasaagaramaam naathhaa!
Praarththhichadiyaarothunnu. Kuriye... Kuriye… kuriye ....

Doothanmaar se-vippone!
/teeshaa! Nee parishuddhan.
Krobenmaar vaazhtthunnone!
/tshakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
Sraappikall kaadee-shaarppone!
/tmrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Paapikallanuthaapatthodottharththhichothunnu.
/tnyangallkkaayu krooshettone! Krpacheyyenam.

Theemayar haalal-cholvone!
/teeshaa! Nee parishuddhan
Aathmeeyar shlaa-ghippone
/tshakthaa! Nee parishuddhan
Manmayaraagho-shippone!
/tmrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Vishvaasiniyaam thirusabhathan-suthararththhikkunnu.
/tnyangallkkaayu krooshettone! Krpacheyyenam

Melullllor  maa-nippone!
/teeshaa! Nee parishuddhan
Maddhyamar keertthikkunnone!
/tshakthi nee parishuddhan
Keezhullllor  koo-ppunnone!
/tmrthiheenaa! Nee parishuddhan
Paapikallanuthaapatthodottharththhichothunnu
/tnyangallkkaayu krooshettone! Krpacheyyenam.

Naathhaa! Krpacheytheedaname.
/tnaathhaa! Krpacheyyuka kanivaal
Naathhaaിkarmmaarththhanakalle nee kaikkondum krpacheytheedenam
/tdeveshaa! The sthothram
Srashdaave! The sthothram
/tpaapikallaam daasarilaliyum mishihaa raajaave! Sthothram.
(sleebaa mnortthoyil naatti thiri katthichu sleebaayude kukkiliyon cholli dhoopam vaykkanam.)
